title: Really Leaverbuster
body:
WARNING: THIS IS A RANT

So I just got low priority q, and apparently this was from yesterday night, so I checked my history since I didn't afk once in the last who knows when.
What do I get? A game where I apparently DC'd from the start
I remember dodging a game last night at the very last second since I had second thoughts of staying up too late, and the moment I pressed exit, I got a bugsplat message
Now ofcourse, since I got no warnings whatsoever, I simply believed that I successfully dodged the game since the game quit entirely just like when you dodge a game, but APPARENTLY the game still started and counted me as afk
So now I'm here with low priority q, what the actual fuck

replies.body: On the rare occasion that I dodge a queue, I always login again to make sure it didn't start, for reasons like this.
Oh well! It'd be amazing if low priority que could differ manual turns off and disconnects that aren't in your control though (e.g a bloody tree, power outage, drophackers, bills unpaid...etc). lol

Welp.

I'm super careless about my LeaverBuster punishments.

I got up to 15 minutes because I kept forgetting to accept the found match. (I was super distracted on YouTube and too tired to watch the client)

But you only have to go through it once and that's it.
That's unlucky. You could submit a ticket to player support if you believe you received the punishment in error, though whether or not they'll see it that way :/
